query:
SELECT 
  u.email as userEmail,
  s.companyName,
  su.role,
  j.id as jobId,
  j.serviceType,
  j.status
FROM users u
JOIN supplierUsers su ON u.id = su.userId
JOIN suppliers s ON su.supplierId = s.id
LEFT JOIN jobs j ON j.assignedSupplierId = s.id
WHERE u.email = 'testsupplier@example.com'
command:
